page.title: 04FARMING
page.content: ROCKLEY HOUSE FARM,WROTHAM ROAD GR 636634 This is a large,white house built about 1875.5 people reside here and the 5 acres of land comprises of 2 fields,stables,a barn,the house and gardens.5 horses graze in the paddock. SOUTH STREET STABLES South Street Livery Stables covers some 30 acres with stables and grazing land.There are 25 h strawberries and sum berries and wheat.It is situated near the A227.To get to the farm you have to go down a track.This farm is tenanted from a landlord in Foxendown Lane,Meopham.
